column1: International Business and Digital Transformation - MSc
column5: This programme is a masters-level, dual degree programme in partnership with POLIMI Graduate School of Management. Students who successfully complete this programme will be awarded the Masters of Science (MSc) from the University of Reading and the Master di l livello from the POLIMI Graduate School of Management.This Masters programme will equip you with knowledge and skills to investigate, identify, and implement the strategic choices multinational firms need to make to compete in an increasingly digitalised global economy.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
